mapper.select: SELECT c.num, c.content, c.good, c.cheer, c.member_num, m.name as memberName, c.fashion_post_num, c.review_post_num, c.mentoring_post_num FROM COMMENT c JOIN MEMBER m ON c.member_num = m.num WHERE c.num = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (content, member_num, fashion_post_num review_post_num mentoring_post_num ) VALUES (#{content}, #{memberNum}, #{postNum})
